name: Drake Slay Ritual
effects: Increase physical damage against Dragons by 10% to all allies for 5 turns
Increase magic damage against Dragons by 10% to all allies for 5 turns

desc_short: Boosts physical and magic damage against dragons for all allies

Augmente les dégâts physiques et magiques contre les dragons de tous les alliés
Erhöht physischen und magischen Schaden gegen Drachen, alle Verb.
Aumenta el daño físico y mágico contra dragones de todos los aliados
desc_long: Increases physical and magic damage against dragons for all allies
